sections.heading: Pupils; health inspections; duty of school board
sections.text: The boards of education and school boards of the school districts of the state shall enforce the provisions of sections 79-248 to 79-253.SourceLaws 1919, c. 241, ยง 4, p. 1004;C.S.1922, ยง 6539;C.S.1929, ยง 79-2116;R.S.1943, ยง 79-2125;Laws 1949, c. 256,
